name: Aparthotel Bergkristall
description:
Apparthotel in a sunny and quiet location, a few minutes walk from the town centre, young persons room, children's play room, play ground, underground garage, lift, guest lounge, washing machine/tumble dryer, ski cellar, ski boot dryer, sun bathing area. Open air swimming pool (open in summer and winter), sauna, steam room, solarium only 70 metres away in the neighbouring Gästehaus Camping. Internet room.
Each apartment is also available with an additional double room, equipped with a shower/WC, lounge area, Sat-TV, radio and telephone!!(costing between 15,50 and 25.- Euro, depending on the season and number of people).
Included in price: Electricity, water, heating, bed linen/towels. Once weekly use of the sauna/steam room, daily use of the open air pool.

Check in:15.00hr / Check out: 10.00hr.
Directions: Drive to the roundabout at Mayrhofen, turn left towards the BP petrol station, left again towards Laubichl and straight on until the Campingplatz. Turn right just before the Camping, and our Apparthotel Bergkristall can be found at the end of this road.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Apartments: Jasmin and Edelweiss. Suitable for 4-6 persons, (approx. 65m²), 2 bedrooms, lounge with traditional tiled stove, lounge area and sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen, (microgrill, dishwasher...), entrance hall with cloakroom, shower/WC, separate bathroom, north facing balcony, Sat-TV, radio, telephone and safe.
